name: No Life (EyeOfTheCosmos)
description:
WASD to move

Q to dash

While you dash, you are invincible

The point of the game is that you only have one life, and you have to dodge the enemies and bosses and get to the last one. 

This game is only on version 1.1, meaning that there are only 3 bosses, and the game may break after you beat the 3rd. you get special upgrades after every boss.

Good Luck and have fun!
